唔係好明PLU decomposition,其實有咩用？同LU decomposition有咩分別？

一般matrix唔一定有LU factorization
所以要前面乘個permutation matrix將啲rows換位再做LU
e.g. A=[0 1; 1 1] 無LU
用P=[0 1; 1 0], PA會有LU
而且permutation matrix都係orthogonal matrix, take transpose就係inverse
P’ 自己又係一個permutation matrix
PA=LU => A=P’LU

讀numerical analysis/numerical linear algebra會講多啲

學撚完考完試就唔記得
利申 逢數必A
http://www.math.unm.edu/~loring/links/linear_s08/LU.pdf

PLU decomposition同eigenvalue decomposition係兩樣野黎

PLU係systematic d咁搵返gaussian elimination果個linear transformation

U就係平時做完果個upper triangular form, L好似關row operation事

P就係swap row, 因為有時d matrix element太細 電腦計果時唔swap row先會有precision問題
